articles.title: NC State rallies past No. 19 North Carolina in OT, 77-66 :: WRALSportsFan.com - WRALSportsFan
articles.description: Aziaha James led North Carolina State back from a 10-point deficit with just over four minutes to play in regulation, then scored seven points in overtime to carry the Wolfpack to a 77-66 win over No. 19 North Carolina on Thursday night.
articles.content:
By The Associated Press
